ovdesc.p: This application allows details for customers using the Fiduciary system to be recorded.

A customer can express a preference for banks where the placement should be made, and express banks where the placement should not be made. Any preferred bank defined for the customer of an order will used as the default FID.BANK in the placement, if there is only one order used to generate the Placement.

Limits can be expressed for particular banks and an overall bank limit, to allow the customer's exposure for the placement to be controlled. These figures are currently held for information only and do not have any effect on the placement of the Fiduciary.
Customers with no Mandate should be specified on the FD.CUST.DETAILS table. A customer group number for reporting purposes can also be specified on this table.
